entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
